body_html:
Download the cudnn6 and extract it into lib64 file path, in my case: /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64
Ensure that you append the lib64 file path (/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64) to the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable
body_text:
Download the cudnn6 and extract it into lib64 file path, in my case: /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64
Ensure that you append the lib64 file path (/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64) to the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable
body:
Download the cudnn6 and extract it into lib64 file path, in my case: /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64 
Ensure that you append the lib64 file path (/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64) to the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable
